name: Santal Vanille Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Woody Spices.Key Notes:Myrrh, Vanilla, Sandalwood.Fragrance Description:This perfume is reminiscent of a cashmere sweater, wrapped in creamy coconut and aromatic vanilla, and infused with warm myrrh. The long-lasting notes of rich sandalwood leave a lingering impression..About the Bottle:MAKE PERFUME NOT WAR is the mantra at The 7 Virtues, and it is molded into their caps as a reminder. The perfumes are made with natural, fair-trade essential oils, supporting families in nations rebuilding after war or strife. The 7 Virtues believes transparency is key, so visible through the perfume itself, you can read where the fragrance oils were sourced from and the aromatherapy healing benefits of each. All formulations are Leaping Bunnyu2013certified, cruelty-free, and vegan..About the Fragrance:Sandalwood benefits the mind and supports focus with its aromatherapeutic benefits. This perfume is hypoallergenic, infused with sugar-cane alcohol, and contains 25 percentu2013fragrance oils for a long-lasting natural scent. Our sustainably sourced sandalwood from Sri Lanka provides environmental education for women.
ingredients: ALCOHOL DENAT, FRAGRANCE/ PARFUM, WATER/EAU/AQUA, COUMARIN ,LIMONENE, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, CITRAL, FARNESOL, CITRONELLOL
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- The 7 Virtues peace perfumes were designed to layer with one another to create your own unique signature peace perfume..- Apply liberally to your pulse points, as fragrance intensifies with your bodyu2019s warmth.  .- For a longer lasting natural scent layer with our Perfume Oil. .- Allow these scents to blend with your natural pheromones and get ready for endless compliments.  .- After applying avoid rubbing your wrists together as this breaks down the fragrance causing it to wear off more quickly.  .- If you wear our perfumes on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand washing as this can rinse the scent off.  .- Because this perfume contains organic sugar cane alcohol, it also acts as a sanitizer, keeping your skin fresh and clean...Recycling Instructions: .All box packaging is made from FSC certified sustainably managed forests and is recyclable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great clean brand! Smell is sweet. I purchased as a gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dare I say this is my favourite perfume of all time? I am extremely sensitive to scents -- but this never gives me a headache and also does not affect my eczema-prone skin! Clean and hypoallergenic. I own Vanilla Woods as well, however this scent clears it by far. It is a more sophisticated, layered vanilla that really transforms on the skin and has great lasting power. A truly unisex scent in my opinion. Perfect for fall/winter. I will be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, I love this fragrance, it has pretty good longevity, I adore how it settles on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am on an eternal search for good Sandalwood fragrances and I would say this is one of the better ones out there. It's important, however, to note this is a strong/spicy Sandalwood scent and not quite as creamy as described. Unlike many Sandalwood fragrances, you truly smell a bold, spicy Sandalwood from first spray. The rather sweet vanilla, in my opinion, is the base note here and after a few hours becomes the dominant scent. Very close to Atelier's Santal Carmin though if you loved that scent and have been looking for something along those lines. Just know it's a bold scent and with a strong vanilla turn if you're looking for something more sheer, dry or less intense.

reviews.review_title: Woodsg & somewhat spicy vanilla dream. Love this.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love woodsy smokey and spicy scents with a dash of warm vanilla then you'd probably love this. At first it's very spicy and woodsy , which I love. The drydown has way more vanilla and less of the spice and woodsy notes. I did not smell any coconut which is unfortunate. I paired this with 7 Virtues Vanilla Woods and they complemented each other beautifully.  Santal Vanille is a beautiful surprise in a world of predictable fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t really care for this one that much. It has too much of a woody smell to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I liked it when I first started using it. It was spicy and woodsy. This now smells sour on me. I never got vanilla at all. On my skin it smells like rotting wood with a hint of incense. Luckily I only have a sample of this. I will be throwing it out.

Absolutely LOVE this scent! While I love all the vanilla 7 Virtues products, this one is my all-time fav! I have most of the 7 virtues scents and my partner also prefers this one the most. He says it smells so good he could almost wear it himself - and he should! Love this brand, their mission, and the impact their having on the world. Will never be without this perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells really nice but disappointing packaging. It leaks frequently and is really not suitable for travel at all. Iu2019ve probably lost a half of the bottle. If you buy, keep upright and tighten the lid frequently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best dang perfume Iu2019ve ever smelled! Iu2019ve always worn vanilla-based perfumes (their Vanilla Woods is also amazing) but this one adds another layer. I love the earthiness of the sandalwood and how they made it still feminine and inviting yet not overwhelming. I get complements every time I wear it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Smells like a sweet, fresh, woodsy vanilla. I canu2019t stop smelling it!

reviews.review_title: Smells like a men's lotion. I don't smell vanilla.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Masculine leaning for sure! At first, it is very spicy and overwhelming, but It dries down to a laundry/cashmere scent. I don't pick up the vanilla at all. the sweetness in it is more like a deodorant or lotion sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. At first I thought it smelled like sunburnt skin and vanilla but the more I wear it, the more addicted I am to the scent. It's so unique as a vanilla scent, very very warm as the description says - like a cashmere sweater. If you are into warm, gourmand scents with great sillage and longevity, this one is definitely worth a try. The brand philosophy is a super plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this at first, but after a while it smelled like rotten pickles. Terrible! Also the scent lasted all day. The only time Iu2019ve wished a scent wouldnu2019t last so long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. Itu2019s rare for me to be able to wear perfume without it giving me a headache and this doesnu2019t do that! Lasts all day too. So glad I found this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a blind buy. I got it because it was highly recommended and I hated it. Idk what Iu2019d have to pair it with to wear it. Itu2019s a u201cnou201d for me right now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Slightly disappointed, i wanted to love this because i LOVE this perfume brand. Itu2019s extremely heavy on the Myrrh and sandalwood scent. If you prefer a more u201cOutdoorsyu201d scent you would probably like it. It smells exactly like essential oils, to me it doesnu2019t smell like perfume and i do not get any vanilla from this at all. Itu2019s not a light scent by any means, itu2019s very warm and not sweet smelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I blind purchased this based off of other peopleu2019s reviews. I like vanilla and sandalwood scents. And when i found out about this, i didnu2019t hesitate to purchase. When it arrived, boy oh boy, it is heavenly! This is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had samples of both Santal 33 and this perfume from the 7 Virtues sample pack. I fully planned on buying Santal 33 because I wanted a sandalwood scent. However, when I tried this one I instantly fell in love. I sprayed one on each wrist- the 33 had way more of a leather note where this had more of a sweet, vanilla note. I absolutely love this perfume and had to get the full size. I feel like projection is good and it lasts all day on me as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Went in looking for vanilla woods since I heard it smells like sol de janeiro 40, I was disappointed since it does not but I found this one! Smells beautiful and I like to layer this with sweeter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i didn't think i liked vanilla scents until i tried this  fragrance! so spicy and warm without being sickly sweet!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeeeeee this perfume, I originally bought the oil rollerball and fell in-love with the scent. I will admit that I prefer the oil because it lasts longer and is stronger, but thats to be expected. It's a very warm and spicy scent so if thats not your thing I would steer clear, but it also has sweet notes to it aswell that i find perfectly balance the spiciness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice and sexy vanilla, not a typical vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed! I havenu2019t ventured into a new perfume since 2017, and now that I have, I donu2019t think I can go back! This is the first scent Iu2019ve ever worn that truly lasts all day. Every time I catch a whiff, Iu2019m so happy I tried this! Perfect blend of

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This would be nice for a room spray , but not perfume ; itu2019s extremely heavy on the sandalwood and myrrh. I donu2019t smell any vanilla even on the dry down. Iu2019m extremely disappointed, I had high hopes, but sadly this didnu2019t live up to them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really loved that perfume, I bought it 4 times convincing myself that I didn't need the big one. Gets compliment from women & men. Smells like santal 33 with a little bit of Vanilla. The oil should be good also but it's always sold out. The bottle spills a little be careful.

reviews.review_title: bring back the roller oil please!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have this product in the spray as well as the discontinued roller oil, which is amazing for layering under other scents. the oil was my favorite formulation but i canu2019t get it anymore :,(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this to expand my horizonsu2026I hated it. Immediate return. Was expecting the slightest vanilla scent but smells like straight up sandalwood but not even the good kind if that makes sense. Just not a good perfume. makemakesense.wasenawful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Omg, if I could bathe in this I would. Sandalwood-y, warm, cardamom-y, vanilla-y, super long lasting and real smelling. Spicy, sensual, but not overpowering. Divine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful creamy vanilla scent that is *not* sweet! Picture stylish cashmere sweaters in NYC or cozying up with a good book on a snowy day. I once heard Taylor swift wears this scent, although I donu2019t know how true that is! But it smells amazing and I am in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: tried this in the 7 virtues discovery set and could not stop smelling it. i get the cardamom note pretty heavy which i love. woody and spicy but also sweet. head over heels for this and will be buying the full size asap

reviews.review_title: Will never live without the 7 Virtues
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buying every single one of the perfumes for myself. And buying some for my friends and family also. Love every scent. Buy it. Buy them all. You wonu2019t regret it, and youu2019ll smell amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this smells but the spray came in half full and the dispenser for the perfume is broken. I have mobility issues and cannot return this product in time. This is not the first time in 2023 that I received a broken product from Sephora

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a die hard gourmand, vanilla, deep, smoky, sexy fragrance lover. Didnu2019t have any interest in this for YEARS. That was until I WORE it. Iu2019ve never felt so calm, at peace, fresh, yet creamy and warm. Itu2019s a perfect fragrance for gourmand lovers who wats to smell fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: rollerball broke and leaked the perfume.

I got the last travel size at a Sephora near me and the box had been opened but I didnu2019t think much of it. Turns out, the sprayer was loosened perhaps, and I lost quite a bit of product the first time I went to spray this because the sprayer came off. I smelled the box and it was probably leaking inside all the way home. I did learn that these spray bottles are refillable though. I would repurchase a travel size but am not yet ready for a larger bottle of this.
After trying a few 7virtues products this has quickly become my signature scent. Not too strong for work, but the perfect warm vanilla fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is everything I wanted from Le Labo's Santal 33 and Versace's Crystal Noir - two perfumes that didn't work well on my skin, but that I loved on paper. Santal Vanille has the best of both worlds: the lovely, rich sandalwood in Santal 33, and the breezy, tropical coconut from Crystal Noir, with a touch of added vanilla. Together, they make a stunning, unique scent that I can't get enough. My boyfriend really likes it as well, and he's quite picky with scents. The scent has medium longevity on my skin (approx. 3-4 hours) but lasts days on clothes. I am so happy I came across this gem, and hope they don't discontinue it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin

Honestly, Santal Vanille is just perfect and I'm obsessed. It lasts about 5ish hours on me but I'm ok with that!

I have both vanilla woods and santal vanille and they are both beautiful scents. However, DO NOT BUY the rollerball or the travel spray of these perfumes. they both leak and the packaging needs to be fixed.
incredible fragrance for those who love santal. only downside is that it doesnu2019t wear very long. would give it five stars if it were more potent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I bought the rollerball after trying The 7 Virtues sample set, and while I love the portability of the this size, I do prefer a spray as I tend to be pretty heavy handed with my perfumes and like to spray it everywhere.  AND!!! If you received a rollerball that isn't filled all the way to the top - return or exchange!! It should be to the top. The attached photo shows the under-filled (left) and the new one I got after checking the boxes in sephora (right)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

If I smelled this on a guy I would want to be near him just to catch a whiff. Overall a really great edp once the harshness of the top notes mellows out.
If you like the smell of wood chips go for it. Itu2019s awful in my opinion.

reviews.review_title: Patience pays off with this lovely scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

When I first rolled this on, there was a camphorous note u2014 perhaps the leading edge of the sandalwood? u2014 that I found almost off-putting, but after a few minutes it began to develop into a rich, creamy sandalwood. A few minutes after that, the warm vanilla notes emerged. This isnu2019t a fragrance with incredible throw u2014 think of it more as a treat for those lucky enough to be in your immediate orbit u2014 but if youu2019re looking for a warm scent with great depth and a company with admirable ethics, then this clean perfume is for you!

reviews.review_title: Why do only the bad scents have staying power?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: beautiful and unusual, fun yet mysterious!
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is lovely. It is also pretty unique. I am pleased with the balance of sandalwood and myrrh. Myrrh is often not well balanced, as it has a smoky quality. And Sandalwood is often  included from a poor source or something, and smells either absent or just bad. I am obsessed with sandalwood so I am always on a mission to find good fragrances that represent sandalwood well. This product definitely scores pretty highly to me. I think this is just a lovely unisex fragrance. Sexy, warm, kind of mysterious, and not too badly priced. A little goes a long way and it is long lasting too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

Itu2019s a warm scent though but reminded me too much of my grandmothers perfume to continue to wear it. I personally feel itu2019s more for an older crowd :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Don't put santal first if it's a vanilla perfume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Woody scent for colder weather
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful woody scent of vanilla and sandalwood. Itu2019s an amazing fragrance for warm cozy winter days. Itu2019s very long lasting as well. It lingers on your outfits for so long. Itu2019s spicy and cozy. Great scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing!  I would never tell anyone to do this, but only with this perfume, read the notes about it and if it speaks to you, well then purchase it. Youu2019ll be pleasantly surprised when you receive it. Iu2019m constantly getting compliments and asked on what perfume am I wearing. Iu2019m on my second bottle; which says a lot because I donu2019t typically go through my perfumes that quick. Itu2019s not because the smell doesnu2019t last because it does. I just find myself choosing this to wear more than all my other perfumes. Iu2019d be surprised if you were disappointed in it. Sephora has a great return policy if you find yourself not meshing with it, but Iu2019d be surprised if you found yourself not enjoy it. Treat yourself to a wonderful perfume. You most likely wonu2019t be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hubby found this to me, since he knows I adore both Santal & Vanilla fragrances. But my 2 favorites in one gorgeous perfumeu2026??? This is heaven. Creamy, seductive and very long lasting (ok, I use with the perfume oil as well).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is amazing! Very high quality perfume. The scent is beautiful. Sandalwood is one of my favorite scents to wear and the combination with the vanilla here makes this one unique. The size of the rollerball is very nice as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Santal Vanille Aromatherapy Perfume is happiness in a bottle.  The notes of coconut, vanilla and sandalwood blend perfectly.  The vanilla stands out and the fragrance is so enjoyable.  Not overpowering just enough to lift your spirits.  It reminds me of cozy nights by the fire wrapped in a warm blanket.  Perfect scent to go from Winter to Spring! Also love that this fragrance is vegan and cruelty free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This rollerball is clean and free! It has hints of of sandalwood, myrrh, and of course vanilla. It lasts a good amount of time and itu2019s easy to apply. Itu2019s more so a fall/winter season perfume. It definitely makes a statement!

reviews.review_title: A SCENT FOR A GROWN WOMAN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this while browsing the store and fell deep in love. I've been wanting to get away from fruity and floral as I hit 30 this year. My god this smell is mouth watering, sensual and long lasting. It's warm and spicy that makes a statement and makes you unforgettable. Trust it's not your regular vanilla. I bought the rollerball and immediately buying the large bottle now.

I can not put it into words on how good this smells. It is light but it makes such a statement. Warm and woody, notes of leather, a little smoke...hints of figs, leather, and sandalwood. It is earthy, dry, and spicy as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is amazing, its very strong at first and has a delicious scent. Its both very feminine and masculine at the same time, hard scent to describe but definitely vanilla and musk scents mainly. Only thing is it doesnu2019t wear that long, the scent wares of the body.This was gifted to me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think I just discovered my new fragrance fave with this unique scent. I really like this warm and spicy blend of mixed notes. Itu2019s not your typical Vanilla scent. It has unexpected notes of spicy Sandalwood, Myrrh and creamy coconut in there too.   I like that this is not heavy but it feels warm and comforting. It is long-lasting toou2026I could still pick up notes in the late afternoon after applying it in the early morning. The notes of Myrrh and Sandalwood adds to the spicier scent of this lovely and convenient rollerball fragrance. Sandalwood also supports the mind and clear focus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the packaging and the easy roller ball application. The scent was a mixture of sweet and musky and overall very sensual. Warm and spicy. Great to travel with or bring on the go for a quick refresh. Scent lasted all day! Love that itu2019s vegan and clean. The aromatherapy benefits made me feel confident, peaceful and relaxed.

I received this Santal Vanille EDP Travel Rollerball complimentary from 7 Virtues in exchange for my honest review. I am totally obsessed with this spicy and warm vanilla scent! It's absolutely mouthwatering! Such a beautiful, delicious, and sensual fragrance! It's definitely one of my most favorite scents from 7 Virtues! I totally recommend it to everyone! I'm not normally a fan of spicier scents; I usually prefer fruity and floral scents, but this one is just so amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I smelled this perfume in store off of Tatiu2019s recommendation and really liked it. I still enjoy it but thereu2019s something about it when itu2019s on me that I just donu2019t like AS much. Itu2019s a nice, warm spicy vanilla. Actually reminds me a lot of skylar call cashmere. If you like that one youu2019ll love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This scent is intoxicating and addictive! The first time opened up my rollerball, I was hooked! The sweet vanilla hits immediately but it is balanced by the sophistication and complexity of the sandal! The soft woodiness of the fragrances gives it a sultry, sexy, and sophisticated vibe. This isnu2019t your typical vanilla fragrance. You definitely notice the creamy coconut note throughout that leaked it feel cozy and warm but not adolescent and fruity. The fragrance lasts a really long time on your skin. It definitely has projection, I will smell up to 5 hours later but I donu2019t think itu2019s an all day scent. If youu2019ve been looking for grown up vanilla fragrance, this is it! Itu2019s so delicious and beautiful! This fragrance will definitely have people asking you what you are wearing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a lovely scent! So different, warm and woody. I will Definitely be wearing this throughout the winter months. The applicator is really great too, the roller ball is super easy! Great for traveling too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is beautiful but itu2019s not your typical vanilla so keep that in mind. Itu2019s a grown up type of vanilla, woody a little musky, and if needs some time to settle into the skin for it to turn sweeter. If youu2019re into that type os scent this is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this new scent gifted by 7 Virtues. it has a really lovely warm scent with a hint of sweet from the vanilla. I would say that the Sandalwood and Myrrh are the main scents here making it have a really warm and spicy feel. the vanilla is more of a hint at the end to tie everything together. I think the notes work really well together and its my perfect everyday scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this fragrance is really elegant and can be used for everyday! It has more of a sweet scent than a mature wooden scent but you can smell it a bit. I also really like the roller ball feature for easy application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Santal Vanille from The 7 Virtues in exchange for my honest review. My first impression of the packaging was that it is the perfect size for on the go! It's about the size (maybe a little bigger) than a liquid lipstick so it can easily be thrown in a bag or purse to refresh your scent throughout the day. The vanilla and coconut blend together to make a scent that is so warm and spicy and truly perfect for winter. It's very calming, centering, and therapeutic. I'm not a huge fan of in your face coconut and this is not that at all! My boyfriend loves the scent and I've started wearing it to bed because the scent is so comforting.

reviews.review_title: not my personal favorite, vanilla woods is better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the vanilla woods perfume so I was excited to try the Santal vanilla. It didn't smell exactly as I would expect, I expected more of a spicy scent but to me it is very strong on the coconut. don't really smell the vanilla at all. you smell the sandalwood once it dries down more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

With this one, the initial opening wasnu2019t my favorite but as it dried down it quickly grew on me. It starts off a little bit masculine but mellows out to a a warm woody vanilla scent. I find that the myrrh, sandalwood and vanilla are the most prominent notes here leaving you with an edgy, earthy vanilla perfume. While this one is still good, I would probably still reach for my favorite Vanilla Woods from them instead!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love this perfume!! Iu2019m really into sweet scents but theyu2019re hard to get right. Sometimes they are way too sweet and sickly or are not sweet enough, but this one is a perfect in between for me. Also love the roller ball for travel

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin

This is the perfect sexy warm spicy earthy scent. It is a perfect balance of rustic woody masculine scents and softer warm feminine florals. It has become my go-to scent. I wear it every single day. I love it so much that I stopped rotating my perfumes. This scent is all I need. It is practically perfect in very way. I receive compliments all the time. I highly recommend this scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent, it is very unique. It's a warm and spicy fragrance, a little bit earthy too. Not overly sweet like other villa scents so it is a bit of an unexpected combination of notes. Love the rollerball, it is so convenient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

Sometimes I spray it a little just on the wrists and I get to smell it everytime j move my hands. It is warm, spicy, comforting, exotic. Definitely makes me feel like I am wearing something ancient and unique perhaps from Egypt or India. It is well made. The Sandalwood is a little stronger then the vanilla, especially at first. This scent changes and mixes with my akin perfectly about 15 minutes after I put it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s such a unique scent. It has warm, earthy scent with a hint of vanilla scent thatu2019s not overpowering. It lasts for the whole day, If you like earthy, musky scent this is for you. Itu2019s great size to keep in the purse and carry along anywhere you go too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Vanilla has always been one of my favorite notes but it can often be too sweet. I prefer when a vanilla has a bit more spice to it and this one is beautiful. It is just floral/sweet enough to evoke vanilla but in a sophisticated way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

Itu2019s not overwhelming at all and honestly could use this any time of the day for any occasion. I love the compact size of it. Iu2019ve always preferred smaller sized perfumes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a strong and sexy scent! I thought itu2019d be too overwhelming for me but it actually compliments me so perfectly. My husband gives me nonstop compliments on it and I love it for daily use. Iu2019m definitely going to be coming back for another!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I love how densely packed the brush is and it is super soft on the skin. Complimentary from Rose Inc!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with how warm and comforting this is. It seems to be very long lasting. I can get used to wearing this year round.  Itu2019s warm and spicy and creamy without being too overwhelming. Definitely a repurchase for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

I tend to lean towards sweeter, dessert like perfumes such as vanilla and this is a must try for someone who is similar to me. This can definitely be worn year round and leave a nice impression on others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect every day scent. It isnu2019t too sweetu2014just nice and cozy. I get so many compliments when I use this scent.My everyday perfume now.Totally recommend people to try this perfume worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells so good. It is travel friendly and I really love using this. I have got so many compliments about the perfume and it stays on the skin for quite a long time. I love vanilla sense and it is truly amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Came in a leaky container, however; the smell is really nice. I got very strong sandalwood notes at first, and after a couple hours, it transformed into a very soft vanilla/coconut smell, while still not being too sweet. I would give 5 stars if not for the spillage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: smells like wood and spice and vanilla. a tad on the masculine side but i don't mind. i'm completely addicted!

reviews.review_title: Should have listened to other reviews.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Defective product. I should have heeded the warnings in other reviews as fragrance arrived in a leaky container plus about one third of it was missing due to the leak. So disappointed.

reviews.review_title: 7virtues delivers a rare treat in this parfum!
reviews.review_text: On a cold wintry night I found this rollerball product as I strolled through the perfum section. This fragrance is simple, clear, long lingering aromatic oil. I put it in my purse. The next morning the smell was so clean and refreshing. I love it. It is simply a great choice for the conscious consumer wanting to support a product knowing where it is sourced, packaged and for a social purpose. 7 virtues is that perfum that makes you feel warm , wrapped in a sweater that is both familiar and refreshing. Thanks Sephora for stocking this product that stands out amongst the long list of designer perfumes with no real conscious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: smells really nice and itu2019s much bigger than I expected but when I opened it, it spilled all over me. not sure where the liquid came from because the bottle itself isnu2019t leaking. other than that i love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t smell the vanilla part in this. I read somewhere it was a nice dupe for Nirvana Black (which is discontinued) but not at all!

reviews.review_title: Heard of Vanilla woods before discovering this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was really struggling to decide between this and Vanilla Woods. I like vanilla and coconut sents, not a big fan of heavy florals. So I decided to purchase but this and Vanilla Woods to compare. I must say I really like this fragrance from the first wear. I sprayed both at the same time on a perfume paper and left it to sit. Santal Vanille lasted longer and had a stronger scenet than Vanilla Woods as time went on. I could smell initially the Sandalwood but it does calm down and then you smell the Vanilla coconut becomes very clear the longer you wear it. I could smell it on myself for hours after, which has never happened to me with any other fragrance. Vanilla woods is nice too, if you enjoy a hit of florals with vanilla you would enjoy. Santal Vanille is such a unique but sexy fragrance and i find it very versatile. It layers really well with other scents. I really dont see how you can go wrong with this fragrance, I perfer it over Vanilla woods if i had to decide. But i will still continue to use both! They layer well together as well

reviews.review_title: Sophisticated, earthy seductress of a fragrance.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you consider yourself to be seductive, earthy and intriguing, put down Vanilla Woods and pick up Santal Vanille. This is the scent of a woman who has lived adventurously, ridden horseback in Nepal, climbed sand dunes in Dubai and dined at the top of the Eiffel tower.   I am a fan of warm, vanilla scents, but if you are looking for a safe, sweet, edible vanilla smell this is not that! This is a very earthy, plant-forward composition, that leans into the natural essences of vanilla, and raw coconut wrapped in the spice of myrrh, while sandalwood carries through beneath. When I close my eyes, I think of a woman wearing a backless, black linen dress with an elegantly placed tattoo on her spine and a gold bangle on her arm. She's inviting you in for tea at her effortlessly wabi sabi home.   Like this woman, this fragrance is a bit rough around the edges. That gives it it's mystery, You will be surprised by the strong opening when you spritz, it might even be a bit offensive and masculine to some but, to me it is woody, a bit green, intriguing and very sexy. It dries down into the creamy warm, sweet spicy scent mentioned, that invites you to stay for a second cup of tea... and who know's what after. Smoking hookah in a standalone marble tub?   I love this fragrance because these factors make for a sophisticated vanilla that can be worn by any gender and age. This is not your adolescent, Please like how I smell! body-spray type of vanilla. This is Santal Vanille.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a love and hate for me. Itu2019s very different then my usual go to fragrance. I smell a lot more of the sandalwood and myrrh scents to make it kinda u201cwarmu201d and u201cspicyu201d. But the more I smell it I get the feminine undertone of vanilla and coconut. Itu2019s a unique one to me and itu2019s really not for everyone. I wouldnu2019t use this as a daily fragrance. Sometimes I spray this and a spray of vanilla woods together

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I do enjoy spicy and warm scents, but for some reason I did not care for this fragrance. I did not smell any vanilla even after hours of wear, and the only note I really was able to pick up on was sandalwood. Overall, I didn't love it and will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I did not like this particular scent after spraying it on my wrist while in Sephora as it initially reminded me of Mulch. After wearing it for a few hours & being outdoors, the scent became one of my favorites!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing alternative if musky/floral perfumes give you headaches. It smells like the pit of a mango, when it gets that spicy sweet smell? Incredible. Doesnu2019t smell musky or u201cperfume-yu201d, projects really well, lasts VERY long, the scent is natural enough that itu2019s suitable for office or classroom. Sandalwood is super dominant at first but it gets sweeter as it dries down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume!! I sampled it in a local Sephora yesterday and can literally still smell it on my wrists today. It starts out with a heavier myrrh note but settles into this beautiful cashmere/sandalwood/vanilla that isnu2019t too cloying and (in my opinion) works in any season. Would recommend 100000%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a whim to test out because I wanted to have a vanilla scent in my perfume collection. It's the perfect transition scent from fall to winter. The perfume is warm and sweet, kind of reminds me of a cashmere sweater or what the Taylor Swift song 'Cardigan' would smell like. It also has earthy aromatics as well. It lasts for a long time too. Can't wait to buy a full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loathed this perfume! It had a spicy almost masculine scent and there was no vanilla! Even worse, I had to wash my arm four times just to get the scent off. Iu2019d have given this perfume zero stars if I couldu2019ve.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve spent years trying to find a signature scent and Iu2019m so glad I finally found it! The initial spray is a bit sharp and I get the scent of sweet hay/grass (not a bad thing) but then it settles into a spicy vanilla with sandalwood hanging out in the background and it smells PHENOMENAL. It has comforting and warm vibe but also a bit of intrigue and mystery with the sandalwood that keeps it interesting. It sounds cheesy but I want my friends and family and my future children to remember me by this scent! I also really really love that the brandu2019s mission and that itu2019s sustainable and ethical and there are no toxic ingredients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Smells like Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille. Great fragrance for the winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like this at all, the smell is not alluring whatsoever.  I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is very refreshing and nice to have around you on an daily basis,thanksu2026.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

This is perfect for gifting,  and the perfect size for your purse!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this fragrance!  I had never heard of this brand until an influencer talked about Vanilla Woods on her YouTube. I got myself a small sample of VW through an online order. I really liked it!  I went into my local Sephora to buy a bottle of VW and saw this - actually I saw the word Santal and I flipped because sandalwood is my soul mate. So I ended up buying the bottle of VW and the roller ball of Santal Vanille. I wore the VW every day and itu2019s lovely. But on the days I added on the Santal Vanille OR wore Santal Vanille on its own, everyone asked me what perfume I was wearing and said I smelled u201cdivine, beautiful, sensual, sexy, mysteriousu201d. So I have finally finished the bottle of VW and just ordered a holiday gift set of this Santal Vanille. I smell a small u201cpoofu201d of vanilla in the beginning and then the warmth of the Santal comes through and stays with me all day. I donu2019t think I smell anything else except the smallest amount of vanilla and then sandalwood. I love this. I love it love it. I even wear it to bed!  YSL Libre was my signature. This has taken itu2019s place. I also love the story behind this brand and think itu2019s a wonderful product and company to support. If they made this scent in a candle/laundry detergent/soap/lotion/anything lol, I would buy it in a heartbeat.  Love it xu2019s a million loves.

reviews.review_title: Smells SOOO good! But the longevityu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had never heard of this brand or perfume before and I am so excited to have received this because I loved it. This The 7 Virtues Santal Vanille Rollerball Perfume was heavenly scented to me. Not only did I enjoy the fragrance but I enjoyed learning about this brand. The scent isn't to strong or overpowering but it's definitely dominant.  Very earthy and woodsy fragrance notes with myhr,  vanilla, coconut, and sandalwood all shining through. Takes me to a very calming place. Very exotic to me. I love the usage of the essential oils for the aromatics.  I love that brand is focused on a cause also.  Big plus for pushing women's  education on environmental causes.  Cruelty free, vegan, hypoallergenic are also huge draws for me. The name itself speaks volumes with Virtues, I'm totally down with the cause.  I love knowing I'm using an amazing fragrance from a company who supports clean beauty, a clean planet, women's empowerment and is transparent in their resources sources. Kudos, I have a new favorite perfume brand.  I can't say enough good about my experience with this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

Unlike anything Iu2019ve tried before and I donu2019t know quite how to explain it but it almost relaxes me. Itu2019s a combination of the vanilla and sandalwood. Iu2019ve found it to be the perfect strength- not overpowering but long lasting. My favorite thing is that it is a clean product! Itu2019s without phthalates, parabens or sulfates. On the bottle it even says the perfume provides farmers and their families with fair wages. I have never seen such before on a perfume but that stood out to me! I would love to try more of their perfumes as Iu2019m really loving this. I was gifted this product by The 7Virtues.

reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful fragrance. Iu2019m typically a floral perfume person, but this particular perfume caught me by surprise as to how beautiful it is! You definitely get the sandalwood scent right away. Itu2019s a beautiful fall scent in my opinion & lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start off by saying I like the fact that this rollerball is apart of the clean beauty section at Sephora. I don't see many fragrances that are considered clean, so this is great. Now besides that, I don't think this is a gender neutral fragrance. It smells more feminine on me. It also smells way to strongly of vanilla and sandalwood combined. Instead of it being a happy mixture of both scents, it's just too intense. The intensity eventually dies down throughout the day and it starts to smell sweet. A little bit of the rollerball goes a long way. If I liked the smell this would have been perfect since it's clean and lasts a long time. I would still give this 3.5 stars out of 5 mainly because of those reasons I've mentioned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the 7 virtues brand for the first time...the fact that it uses clean ingredients really appealed to me..the woody and earthy scent is quite strong and long lasting..all the fragrances promised are present in the rollon with sandalwood being most prominent.. the rollon is small and compact..can be used for travel..the scent can also be used for aeromatherapy since it is somewhat incense stick like..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This rollerball perfume was given to me by 7 virtues. The combination of vanilla and sandalwood makes the scent smell sooo good. Its long lasting and easy to apply on. I can smell the scent on me througout the whole day. Definitly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells warm and sexy while still being a youthful, fun scent! I love it! And it stays one very well, I didnu2019t feel the need to put on much at all. On the plus side, I donu2019t have to worry about what kind of weird ingredients are in the perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The combination of vanilla and sandalwood is elegant  and soothing. It leaves you smelling great and lasts all day. I canu2019t wait to purchase this smell in a bigger container than just a rollerball. It has become my new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this brandu2019s fragnance. It is so simple and amazing. I lived the rillerball so easy to carry around. The fragnance has amell of vanilla which my husband loves on me. Highly recommend this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this fragrance roller ball recently. I love how ethical this brand is. The perfume is a little more spicy and herbal than Iu2019d like, but still  good overall.  I find that these donu2019t make me as allergic either!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance! I love the fact that I put it on in the morning and it last all day and evening. It has a lovely light clean scent. I get many compliments every time that I wear it. I also love the fact that once it is on, people around me smell it but I donu2019t. I suffer from migraines so that is a wonderful thing for me. I love to smell nice and not trigger a migraine. This is my go to perfume for many years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im enjoying this rollerball perfume. It's convenient and small enough to carry in my purse. The roller works well although sometimes to much perfume comes out. The fragrance is beautiful, floral with a slight hint of vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most sophisticated vanilla scent I ever had. It smelt amazing combined with sustainably sourced sandalwood essential oil from Sri Lanka. I love that it comes in rollerball, very convenient and easy to use. I participated Sephora digital event with the founder of 7 Virtues and was so impressed with the philosophy of the brand. Their logo is - Make perfume not war. So beautiful! Now I want to try more scents. Particularly eyeing Blackberry Lily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Santau2019s Vanille EDP by 7 Virtues smells amazing. The scent is warm, slightly sweet with a hint of spice. I like the exotic scent of myrrh and sandalwood mixed with vanilla. Itu2019s almost like aromatherapy in a bottle. Also, love that itu2019s a clean brand. Beautiful scent and so convenient in a roller bottle to carry with you at any time. I received multiple compliments on it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. The scent is soft and light, with the vanilla scent not being overpowering. It is quite a calming and earth scent. I had people tell me that I smell quite nice and clean, having applied it in the morning... it lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i love the smells of this rollerball and how long lasting it is! its warm and spicy and just wonderful for everyday usage and not to strong. Will definitely be purchasing the full size once i finish this roller ball!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was a gift from 7Virtues for review. I am really enjoying the smell of this perfume. It is long lasting a while I donu2019t believe it is an every day perfume I really do enjoy this smell for a special occasion. I definitely feel this is more of a fall or winter scent for most! So excited to get more use of it later this year!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing! I love that its the perfect travel size so that I can carry it with me every where especially during the summer time when we have to reapply a good scent on ourselves. Giving this a 10 out of 10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to fragrance is usually vanilla based so I love to vanilla fragrances from all brands! This one was especially enticing because it was vanilla Santal which I love both notes! I think itu2019s a great combo and would love to get the full size soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really bummed, but I think I will need to return this. I had the travel size and used every last drop. I loved it so much and it lasted decently on me. Every night when I climbed into bed I could still smell it on my bedding from the night before. When I used the last bit I immediately bought the full-size. Oddly enough the full-size spray doesn't last more than 15 min? I can't smell it on clothes or bedding. For the price, I need a bit more projection and longevity.

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s pretty just not my scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t pinpoint where this smell reminds me of. But it reminds me of something. Itu2019s warm and spicy but I get a lot of floral from it. I just bought the rollerball so I might just keep it to use for random occasions but itu2019s not my fav or I wouldnu2019t get the full size. Just because itu2019s not my type of vibe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I currently have the rollerball of this fragrance & it has grown on me. The sandalwood and vanilla really grounds this and it gives a fresh out the shower vibe.

I rate it 3 1/2 to 4. Very nice scent. Not a very heavy vanilla. Definitely worth purchasing the travel size. I need to reapply at least once during the day. Could just be my body chemistry. A lot of fragrances don't last long on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the rollerball of this but I'll be purchasing the full-size soon because I love this fragrance that much! I can see why it would be polarizing for many because the top notes (specifically the myrrh I believe) are quite sharp and not for everyone. But the perfume dries down to a creamy, warm scent that's balanced and not too heavy for summer. I will be wearing this year round but I would definitely recommend spraying this on at the store first instead of blind buying because it might not work with your body chemistry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent, the easiness of use, the fact that is a clean fragrance I'll upgrade to the spray soon!

Words canu2019t describe the experience I had wearing 7 virtues. However, I must say if I had to describe the smell using words; I would say itu2019s were nature meets benevolenceu2026with a purpose. In addition, too meeting Barb (Founder) of the brand; this brought it all together. She is simply a wonderful human being, and we need more people like her in this world.  I will forever not only be a customer, but a person on the front lines supporting the cause. Not only the perfumes and colognes are unbelievable, but also because she is bringing economic change as a true humanitarian and I am glad to be a part of that cause. Thank you, Barbu2026yours truly Raul!   7 Virtuesu2026smell the movement.  In Unity,  Raul Rubio

reviews.review_title: Walking through a Moroccan Market Vibe
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am OBSESSED with this scent. I have had my eye on this since it came out but I wanted to wait until my birthday because birthday money LOL.   It is strong, so if you want something light this is not for you. Personally, I love it and this shows me that it will last a long time, which is what I look for in a perfume. It is a bit more of a masculine scent which I do not mind at all, because I don't believe scents need to be gendered... but to describe it it makes sense. It is more of a myrrh and sandalwood scent than a vanilla.. the vanilla is not strong and it is not super sweet. It kind of smells like incense in the best way possible.   I layer this with aveeno body wash and body lotion and it works really well. I spray this once on my back and once on my chest area and the sandalwood lasts on my clothes for a while and it smells amazing!   If you have smelled sandalwood in the real real, it does not smell the same (unless it dries down on your clothes... then you can definitely smell it), but it does not smell artificial either. I think because it is mixed with the myrrh and vanilla, you are smelling them altogether, obviously! :P  This scent gives me a walking through a Moroccan (or Abu Dhabi, etc) vibe. It is also sophisticated.    10/10 recommended if you like the smell of sandalwood and vanilla :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wowwww, amazing scent. Strong at first but give it an hour and itu2019s the best ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to like this scent so bad because it had everything that I love in it however I was not a fan. Smells very medicinal and artificial in a way. I had to return it unfortunately

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells really strong and is nothing like what I expected. So disappointing! Try vanilla woods instead!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: wow. i am so glad i picked these up (i got vanilla, patchouli and grapefruit). my favourite thing about these (besides the story behind them) is their wear down. they blend so perfectly into the skin and smell even lovelier hours later. i wore it to work and got so many compliments. a must cop.

reviews.review_title: Not what I thought it would be...
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this.  I don't. It reminds me of very astringent patchouli.  I don't smell the vanilla at all for some reason.  Everything usually sweetens up on me, so I go spicy in the beginning.  I'm still on the hunt for the perfect vanilla fragrance.  It's not bad, just not what I was hoping for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely warm, spicy, long lasting scent. Starts out as a light vanilla and coconut cloud. Deeper base notes are spice and musk, but it is crisp and balanced all day. It's not as sweet or as vanilla as 7 Virtues Vanilla Woods. This is saucy and sassy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love these products! My personal favorite is probably Jasmine Neroli or Vanilla Woods

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stinks so bad period! I bought the travel size and itu2019s definitely going back!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sheeeeesh!! This fragrance is stunning! Itu2019s very reminiscent to Le Labo Santal 33 except itu2019s better in my opinion. I always liked Santal 33 but it gave off dill pickle vibes.....Santal Vanille has the same depth and scent but the vanilla and coconut make it much more creamier and smoother.  I donu2019t get the dill pickle vibe at all from this. Itu2019s so beautiful and different from other fragrances. The scent lingers and lasts well. I always have people stopping me and telling me I smell so good and unique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells sooo good! It has the creamy sandalwood, smoky vanilla and the slightest touch of coconut. The scent instantly uplifts my mood. It reminds me of a cross between Tom Fordu2019s Santal Blush and Tobacco Vanille, but not as potent or in your face as TF fragrance. This is an inoffensive, lovely scent that wears so nice throughout the day and emits a cozy, relaxed vibe.
